Uses of Package
org.apache.lucene.queryparser.xml

  • Packages that use org.apache.lucene.queryparser.xml 
    Package Description
    org.apache.lucene.queryparser.xml
    Parser that produces Lucene Query objects from XML streams.
    org.apache.lucene.queryparser.xml.builders
    XML Parser factories for different Lucene Query/Filters.
  • Classes in org.apache.lucene.queryparser.xml used by org.apache.lucene.queryparser.xml 
    Class and Description
    CoreParser
    Assembles a QueryBuilder which uses only core Lucene Query objects
    FilterBuilder
    Interface for building Filters
    FilterBuilderFactory
    Factory for FilterBuilder
    ParserException
    Thrown when the xml queryparser encounters invalid syntax/configuration.
    QueryBuilder
    Implemented by objects that produce Lucene Query objects from XML streams.
    QueryBuilderFactory
    Factory for QueryBuilder
  • Classes in org.apache.lucene.queryparser.xml used by org.apache.lucene.queryparser.xml.builders 
    Class and Description
    FilterBuilder
    Interface for building Filters
    FilterBuilderFactory
    Factory for FilterBuilder
    ParserException
    Thrown when the xml queryparser encounters invalid syntax/configuration.
    QueryBuilder
    Implemented by objects that produce Lucene Query objects from XML streams.
    QueryBuilderFactory
    Factory for QueryBuilder
